column1: Local Foods////Wow! We have been here twice in the last two weeks and I already want to go back again!  The inside of the place has an industrial meets rustic feel.  If that is even such a thing.  It is an order at the counter type place
column2: and all their sides are displayed so you can visually see what looks appealing.  I have tried the chips (similar to kettle chips)
column6: and the best potato salad I have ever tried
column7: and the cabbage slaw (tasty if you like slaw.)
